pullrequest.title: Fix actor animation loading and rendering issues

content.raw: Fixed that!  Now the merged solution works fine. Tested for gazebo worlds/actor.world. However turtlebot simulator doesn't run / recompiled with newer Gazebo headers. May be gazebo_ros_pkgs will need modifications to comply with latest Gazebo (4.0), works fine with 3.1 though.
content.html: Fixed that! Now the merged solution works fine. Tested for gazebo worlds/actor.world. However turtlebot simulator doesn't run / recompiled with newer Gazebo headers. May be gazebo_ros_pkgs will need modifications to comply with latest Gazebo (4.0), works fine with 3.1 though.
